Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Inglaterra Barcelona, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, steps from University of Barcelona and Placa Universitat. This hotel is close to Casa Batllo and Palau de la Musica Catalana.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 60 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary newspapers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor pool. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Inglaterra Barcelona. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Inglaterra Barcelona. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

University of Barcelona - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Placa Universitat - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Centre de Cultura Contemporania de Barcelona - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Francisco Godia Foundation - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Placa de Catalunya - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Tivoli Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Roman Tombs - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Casa Lleo-Morera - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Virreina Palace - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Casa Amatller - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Boqueria Market - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Museu del Perfume - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Casa Batllo - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Fundacio Antoni Tapies - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Inglaterra Barcelona is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 11.8 km / 7.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
